ProductListRate.name: ProductListRate
ProductListRate.description: Represents the list rate of the product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

ListRate.description: The representative list rate of the loan product

Name.description: The name of the product list rate.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the product list rate record.

ProductId.description: The product to which the list rate is associated.

ValidEndDate.description: The start date of the rate.

ValidStartDate.description: The end date of the rate.
